commitMessage: feat: implement timestamp note creation interface
prBody:
This PR implements the note creation interface for VidNote Vault.

Changes:
- Created `VideoDetailView` component which includes the video player and a note input section.
- Implemented logic to pause the video when the note input is focused.
- Added a 'Capture Timestamp' button to explicitly grab the current player time.
- Integrated `storage` service to save notes to localStorage.
- Updated `App.tsx` to handle video selection and navigation to the detail view.
notes: Implemented VideoDetailView and updated App routing to support viewing individual videos and taking notes.
